Package org.apache.fop.cli

This package contains the command-line client for Apache FOP.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AreaTreeInputHandler InputHandler for the area tree XML (intermediate format) as input.
CommandLineOptions Options parses the commandline arguments
ImageInputHandler InputHandler for the images (for example TIFF) as input.
InputHandler Class for handling files input from command line either with XML and XSLT files (and optionally xsl parameters) or FO File input alone
Main Main command-line class for Apache FOP.
 

Package org.apache.fop.cli Description

This package contains the command-line client for Apache FOP.
